title: Bold italic similar to "CooperBlack"
content:
Hello!

Anyone recognise this "Club Rotation" font?

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952im_/http:/cps-static.rovicorp.com/3/JPG_250/MI0002/535/MI0002535908.jpg)
author: sefosete

comments.content:
"Club" looks like a modified **[Stilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Stilla%20LT%20Std%20-%20Regular&fid=7c77a22d8d5264fbdca9d86e5f9e8218&fsize=60&text=Club&fit=1)** by François Boltana (1973) available from Linotype, Scangraphic Digital Type Collection and E&F

"Rotation" must be **[Dogma Script Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/dogma/)** by Zuzana Licko (1994) from Emigre Inc, with a modified /t/i/n

-----------------------------------------------  
I found them using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

"Club": very close to [Stilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/stilla/fonts/). May be modified? [Margarita](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pampatype/margarita/) is in the same vein.  
"Rotation" is [Dogma](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014180952/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/dogma/).
Very good you two, Thank you SO much!
